Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -14,9 +14,9 @@
     // 用户登录
     async login(userInfo) {
       console.log(userInfo);
 
-      const result: any = await post('api/login', qs.str)
+      const result: any = await post('api/login', qs.stringify(userInfo))
       if (result.status == 0) {
         this.userInfo = userInfo
         this.token = result.token
         window.localStorage.setItem('token', this.token)

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -14,9 +14,9 @@
     // 用户登录
     async login(userInfo) {
       console.log(qs.stringify(userInfo));
 
-      const result: any = await post('api/login', qs.stringify(userInfo))
+      const result: any = await post('api/login', userInfo)
       if (result.status == 0) {
         this.userInfo = userInfo
         this.token = result.token
         window.localStorage.setItem('token', this.token)

@@ -40,9 +40,9 @@
     // 修改姓名
     async changeName(username) {
       console.log(username);
 
-      const result: any = await post('my/userinfo', username)
+      const result: any = await post('my/userinfo', { username: username })
       if (result.status == 0) {
         this.userInfo.username = username
         $message.success('修改失败')
         return 'ok'
